languages.text: "Осквернить священнодейство, посвятив его твоей жажде наживы? И не мечтай, кощунница".
"To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."
languages.original_text: "Осквернить священнодейство, посвятив его твоей жажде наживы? И не мечтай, кощунница".

traits.locale_text: "To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."
"To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."

languages.text: «¿Profanar uno de los sacramentos de la Red Sanguinolenta al servicio de su avaricia? Se equivoca, blasfema».
languages.original_text: "To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."

traits.locale_text: «¿Profanar uno de los sacramentos de la Red Sanguinolenta al servicio de su avaricia? Se equivoca, blasfema».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの秘跡のひとつを、自分の欲望のために捧げることで汚すのか？考え直せ、冒涜者め」
languages.original_text: "To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの秘跡のひとつを、自分の欲望のために捧げることで汚すのか？考え直せ、冒涜者め」

languages.text: “你打算玷污织血罗网的圣礼，用来满足你的贪婪？再好好想想吧，亵渎者。”
languages.original_text: "To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."

traits.locale_text: “你打算玷污织血罗网的圣礼，用来满足你的贪婪？再好好想想吧，亵渎者。”

languages.text: "Ein Sakrament des Blutgesponnenen Netzes entweihen und es Eurer Habgier widmen? Falsch gedacht, Blasphemistin."
languages.original_text: "To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Sakrament des Blutgesponnenen Netzes entweihen und es Eurer Habgier widmen? Falsch gedacht, Blasphemistin."

languages.text: « Avilir les saints sacrements de la Toile de Sang sur l'autel de votre avarice ? N'y pensez même pas, blasphématrice. »
languages.original_text: "To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."

traits.locale_text: « Avilir les saints sacrements de la Toile de Sang sur l'autel de votre avarice ? N'y pensez même pas, blasphématrice. »

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı'nın yeminlerinden birini tamahkârlığına hizmet etmek için kirletmek mi? Tekrar düşün günahkâr."
languages.original_text: "To defile one of the Bloodspun Web's sacraments by dedicating it to your avarice? Think again, blasphemer."
